additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Polyglyceryl-3 Oleate, Glycerin, C13-15 Alkane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Undecane, Tridecane, Coco-Caprylate, Sodium Chloride, Magnesium Sulfate, Jojoba Esters, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Polyglycerin-3, Vigna Aconitifolia Seed Extract, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, C12-13 Alkyl Glyceryl Hydrolyzed Hyaluronate, Hydrolysed Hyaluronic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Collagen (Vegetable), Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Ethanol, Sodium PCA, Dextran, Trifluoroacetyl Tripeptide-2, Anigozanthos Flavidus (Kangaroo Paw) Extract, Fragrance.

description: Enriched with Peptides and a blend of Hyaluronic Acid and SKINectura extract to assist in rebuilding the skins architecture to restore a younger skin appearance. Suitable for all skin types 50mL
name: Rewind Age Defence Night Cream
